imdb.plot outline: Sarah, Manar and Farah are three university colleagues as well as friends, each with her own personal problems. Manar suffers from being abandoned by her lover. Sarah lives with a husband that she doesn't like, and whom she didn't marry convincingly. Farah's big problem is that her fiance abandons her before their wedding.
imdb.title: Banat Sukkar Nabat
plot: Sarah, Manar and Farah are three university colleagues as well as friends, each with her own personal problems. Manar suffers from being abandoned by her lover.
